about_the_game:
The second ASMR installment of an alternate IF story different from the main Gachi-Natsu story is here!
A total of about 57 minutes, with realistic sound effects and water sounds that recreate the situation. The version with and without sound effects is included, so you can enjoy ASMR at your leisure in the atmosphere of your choice.
*This is a Japanese-language audio track only.

Track#01
The morning after having sex with your macho sex friend, Kenzaki Atsushi. Atsushi wakes up first and notices that you are still asleep.
He tries to go back to sleep, but when he notices that your dick is fully erect, he can't help but start sucking it.
Track#02
Atsushi appears in the bathroom, wanting to take a bath with "you", who had already taken a bath first. The two of them decide to bathe together, staying close to each other.
Naturally, your cock gets rock-hard when it's pressed up against Atsushi's muscular body, and you end up having sex.
Track#03
Atsushi and "you" start having sex on the bed. It seems like it's going to be over after one shot, but "you" have no idea how much your sexual desire can go.
He changes positions and cums inside Atsushi again and again and again. The intensity is so great that Atsushi climaxes and moans loudly.
Track#04
"Brain Melting Bedtime Ear Licking Voice"
During their intimate cuddling session, Atsushi licks your ears all over, melting your brain with his sweet voice.
